Text: Is this album password protected as always huh?
Ok so I downloaded and I can confirm that it is not, repeat NOT password protected. Good quality with artwork too. Cheers.

JA SĂ–KER SINEA O CONNERS NYA DUBBEL CD
TACK TACK MYRSTACK
PERHELGE
I'm guessing it's at about 203kbps VBR
Now, I don't wanna sound like an idiot, but whattha hell is VBR...? :P I've seen it written in some of the other music torrents, but I can't seem to figure out what it is...

-> DrunkOnShadows

VBR is variable bitrate which means that the bitrate will be distrubuted where it's needed more when compressing to mp3. Usually means better sound, might be standalone player that don't support it.
Thanks trippo... :) One learn as long as one live...

Great collection...I've always liked Clapton but never really wanted to buy/download all his albums to get the 20 or so songs that I liked (especially with Cream and solo) so this is perfect. Recommended.

Great collection but VBR sucks. When is the VBR better sound myth gonna go away?

Long live the Revolution!
Thnx for the up. Would be nice to not have rar'd it tho... So we can see what songs are there and pick and choose if we want. But you've upped alot! Keep up the good work :)

VBR allows a higher bitrate (and therefore more storage space) to be allocated to the more complex segments of media files while less space is allocated to less complex segments. The average of these rates can be calculated to produce an average bitrate for the file.

It's better than 128 dude! But, it's not as good as lossless, and therefor not as large a file.
Good pirating to you All.
